original_title: Bigfoot: The Ultimate Monster Truck Collection
overview: Monster trucks have never raced like this before! Get ready for heart-pounding action from the king of all monster trucks, Bigfoot, with footage chosen by Bigfoot mastermind Bob Chandler. You'll marvel as the huge truck charges past competitors while jumping over -- and sometimes hopelessly crunching -- whatever stands in its way. You won't need to wait until "Sunday! Sunday! Sunday!" with this exciting release.
title: Bigfoot: The Ultimate Monster Truck Collection
